text:
Taxation Administration Order 2021

I make the following order under section 35(4) of the Taxation Administration Act 1997 .

20 July 2021

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Taxation Administration Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Premium component of interest rate
    For the purposes of section 35(4)(b) of the Taxation Administration Act 1997 , 4% is specified as the premium component of the interest rate for the purposes of that Act.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 July 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
